feat: add backend FastAPI application

- Social sentiment analysis \(Reddit, Twitter\)
- Finnish market support \(Helsinki Stock Exchange\)

- Background schedulers for data refresh

EOF
\)")

- Real-time WebSocket updates via Socket.IO
- TradingView-style charts with lightweight-charts
- Dashboard components for US and Finnish markets

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
